title: Deno 2 Arrives With Long-Term Support, npm Compatibility
author: David Cassel
description: Due to be released in early October, Deno 2.0 will come with full backwards compatibility with Node and npm, long term support guarantees, monorepo and workspace support, and more.
cntitle: Deno 2 发布，提供长期支持和 npm 兼容性
cndescription: Deno 2.0 预计将于 10 月初发布，将提供与 Node 和 npm 的完全向后兼容性、长期支持保证、单仓库和工作区支持等功能。
